Class ControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Controller, Storable
public class ControllerImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements Controller
A controller represents a field device controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

    • storeVehCount

      public void storeVehCount(long stamp, int per_sec, int start_pin, int[] veh_count)
      Store vehicle count data.
      Parameters:
      stamp - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.
      per_sec - Sampling period in seconds.
      start_pin - Start pin on controller I/O.
      veh_count - Array of vehicle count samples.

    • storeVehCount

      public void storeVehCount(long stamp, int per_sec, int start_pin, int[] veh_count, VehLengthClass vc)
      Store vehicle count data.
      Parameters:
      stamp - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.
      per_sec - Sampling period in seconds.
      start_pin - Start pin on controller I/O.
      veh_count - Array of vehicle count samples.
      vc - Vehicle class.

    • storeOccupancy

      public void storeOccupancy(long stamp, int per_sec, int start_pin, int[] scans, int max_scans)
      Store occupancy data.
      Parameters:
      stamp - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.
      per_sec - Sampling period in seconds.
      start_pin - Start pin on controller I/O.
      scans - Array of scan samples (0 to max_scans).
      max_scans - Maximum scan value (representing 100% occupancy).

    • storeSpeed

      public void storeSpeed(long stamp, int per_sec, int start_pin, int[] speed)
      Store speed data.
      Parameters:
      stamp - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch.
      per_sec - Sampling period in seconds.
      start_pin - Start pin on controller I/O.
      speed - Array of speed samples (MPH).
